evolve.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if an animal or plant evolves, it changes gradually over a long period of time
evolve.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Animals have evolved camouflage to protect themselves from predators.
Fish evolved from prehistoric sea creatures.
evolve.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to develop and change gradually over a long period of time
evolve.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
The idea evolved out of work done by British scientists.
The group gradually evolved into a political party.
